鱞字的基本解释

鱞
guān
古同“鳏”：“舜闵在家，父何以鱞？”

鱞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《龍龕手鑒》古還切］
(1)鱼名。
(2)同“鰥”。

鱞字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鱞； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1478第33
【字彙】同鰥。【楚辭·天問】舜閔在家，父何以鱞。【王逸註】無妻曰鱞。【補註】鱞經傳多作鰥。

鱞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鱞字的起名意思

暂无。

鱞
Basic explanation of words
鱞
guān
Gu Tong's "Widow": "Shun Min is at home, why does his father win?"
鱞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["The Handbook of the Dragon's Niche" is still cut in ancient times]
(1) The name of the fish.
(2) Same as "Widow".
鱞
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鱞; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1478 33
【Words】Same as widow. [Chu Ci·Heaven Questions] Shun Min is at home, why is his father Yi Xian? [Wang Yi's Note] There is no wife and said Xie. [Supplementary Note] The scriptures of Yan Jing are often used as widows.
